head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FISHEL, HELEN M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FISHEL, HELEN M.

block.p: FISHEL - Helen M. on December 31, 1996, of Rye, NY, age 87. Cofounder of the St. Vincent's Debutante Ball and St. vincent's Dances and a Lady of the Grand Cross of the Holy Sepulcher. Beloved wife of Carlton M. beloved mother of Penelope F. McDermott of Rye, NY, and Kathleen F. McCullough of Chatham, MA., dear grandmother of seven grandchildren and five great-grandchildren. The family will receive friends Friday 2-4 PM and 7-9 PM at the William H. Graham Funder Home, 1036 Boston Post Rd. Rye, NY. Mass of Christian burial Saturday 10 AM at the Church of the Resurrection. Burial Gate of Heaven Cemetery. In lieu of flowers donations to St. Vincent's Hospital (Westchester), 275 North Street, Harrison, NY 10528 or United Hospital Medical Center, Boston Post Road, Portchester, New York 10573.
